name: Dez Altino
description:
'''Tiga Wendwaoga Désiré Ouédraogo''', better known by his stage name '''Dez Altino''', is a Burkinabe singer and guitarist. He sings in the [[Mòoré]] and [[French language|French languages]], and most of his music falls under the [[coupé-décalé]] genre. He has collaborated on numerous occasions with other high-profile Burkinabé artists such as [[Floby (musician)|Floby]] and [[Agozo]].

Altino is also known by his nickname, ''Le Prince National''.
